title: Instructor Emotional Expression Recognition Training in Educational Videos

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Smartphone-based learning environment, considering novice-level understanding of science among professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify the four basic emotions (happiness, satisfaction, boredom, frustration) of human/virtual instructors in video lectures with 80% accuracy
Learners can distinguish positive emotions (happiness/satisfaction) from negative emotions (boredom/frustration) with 90% accuracy
Learners can explain perceptual differences in high-activity emotions (happiness/frustration) between human and virtual instructors

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
